alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:19PM CDT until June 21 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SIOUX COUNTY... At 918 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Mcintosh, or 22 miles northwest of Bullhead, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Standing Rock and Standing Rock Nation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
